Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING
REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Notifies trainers and owners of responsible and humane retirement of horses
Summary: Requires owners and trainers to complete an online training course detailing their responsibilities as a condition of their licensure; requires educational material established by the department of agriculture and markets regarding the responsible and humane retirement of horses to be distributed by equine veterinarians in the state.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Add ยง130, RWB L; amd ยง16, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law and the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the notification of responsible and humane retirement of horses to trainers and owners
